titleStmt.title: The rights and priviledges of the city of London, proved from, prescription, charters, and acts of Parliament also the coronation oaths of several of the Kings of England, together with some arguments to enforce on all great men their duty of acting agreeable thereunto, and to the known laws of the kingdom.

notesStmt.note: Another issue has imprint: London : Printed for R. Baldwin, 1682.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
